output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number (has-cmf): - Yes, contains CMF: 31240006, which indicates this is electoral material
2. Refers to candidate (refers-to-candidate): - Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion Președinte" who is a presidential candidate (Position 2 on the ballot)
3. Addresses wide population (addresses-the-wide-population): - Yes, this is a paid advertisement reaching 10,000-14,999 impressions - Targeted at a potential audience of 500,001-1,000,000 people - Published on both Facebook and Instagram - Uses broad hashtags like #Alegeri2024 #Președinte
4. Electoral objective (electoral-objective): - Clear electoral objective with "George Simion Președinte!" - Uses national flag emojis for emotional appeal - Direct campaign slogan format
5. Journalism (journalism): - No journalistic content - Pure campaign message
6. Personal opinion (personal_opinion): - Not a personal opinion - Formal campaign communication with CMF number
This is clearly electoral propaganda for the presidential election, being published and running after the campaign period has ended (after November 22, 2024, 7:00).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Direct presidential campaign message - Paid advertisement with wide reach - Clear electoral objective - Published after campaign period ended
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO S.R.L, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propagandă electorală după încheierea campaniei electorale. Postarea cu ID-ul 451750557962158 pe Facebook promovează explicit candidatul George Simion la funcția de președinte ("George Simion Președinte!"), conține număr CMF (31240006), este material publicitar plătit cu impact între 10.000-14.999 afișări, difuzat pe Facebook și Instagram după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, când campania electorală era încheiată legal. Materialul are obiectiv electoral clar și vizează influențarea votului pentru candidatul AUR la președinție.
